{"title": "Backgammon HD+", "title_search": "backgammon hd", "title_keyword": "backgammon hd", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/backgammon-hd/", "summary": "Turn-Based Online Multi-Player Coming Soon! {"title": "The Hockey Experiment", "title_search": "the hockey experiment", "title_keyword": "the hockey experiment", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/the-hockey-experiment/", "summary": "***New Low Price!  Originally $3.99*** _________________________________________  IndieDB.com Unity Built Games Competition “Top 10 Finalist” _________________________________________  *** Media Reviews *** “Die-hard fans of the classic 8-bit Ice Hockey style will revel in The Hockey Experiment’s amusing monster-inspired theme…” – AppSpy.com  “The game features rather cartoony style graphics and an amusing 8-bit style game soundtrack that brings additional amusement to the game…” – iPhoneinCanada.ca  “The game has a neat aesthetic...the [Mischievous Muckety Mucks] are very appealing.  The visuals really do work. This is real NES level gameplay.” - 148 Apps  *** iTunes Reviews  *** “One of the best hockey games I’ve played on the iPhone”  “I love the old school feel! Brings me back to the good old NES days”  *** Touch Arcade Member Reviews *** “I’m having a blast playing this game, I’m liking it more and more each time I go to play it, after getting accustomed to everything the gameplay becomes addictive fast…[I give it a] 8.5/10”  “This is a fun hockey game and very much a solid 4 out of 5 stars”  _________________________________________  GAME FEATURES  Fast-Paced 3-on-3 Arcade Style Ice Hockey  Full 3D Graphics  Motion Captured Animations  Classic 8-Bit Style Music  Exhibition and Tournament Game Modes  Two Difficulty Settings:  Novice and Advanced  6 Uniquely Designed Preloaded Teams  2 Achievement-Based Unlockable Teams  4 Extra Teams Available For Purchase  Collect All 24 Humorous Trophies  Totally Radical Power-Ups Give Sweet Skills  On-Ice “Clutch-Shot” Positions Score 2 Points  Ability To Pull Your Goalie  Win Fights To Gain The On-Ice Advantage   Career Stats Keeper  OpenFeint Enabled Leaderboards  Facebook & Twitter Integration  From the unhinged minds of Ninth Dimension Studios comes a very unusual grouping of hockey players known as Mischievous Muckety Mucks™, brought to life through the use of full 3D graphics and Motion Capture Technology.  CLASSIC ARCADE FEEL & UPDATED GRAPHICS  This game features old school inspired 8-bit music and classic arcade-style gameplay, but is updated with fast-paced action and 3D graphics that are enhanced through the use of on-ice Power-Up Icons. These enable crazy-fast slap-shots, lightning-quick skating, and extra powerful checking.    BEWARE OF SOUP EATING DINOSAURS! Play for all the world-famous Ice Hockey teams you know and love, like um … well, like the Brothzillas, you know, the team whose mascot is a dinosaur who pukes up Minestrone soup.  There are way more teams to choose from, but we can’t seem to recall the names at the moment.    THE STANLEY CUP IS NOT FOR MUCKETY MUCKS Practice your skills in Exhibition Mode or shoot for the glory in Tournament Mode.  Rack up enough career goals or wins to unlock cool new teams not available anywhere else.  Collect all 24 special trophies as in-game milestones are reached, like the “Mmm, Generic Cheese Puffs” Trophy that’s awarded to those who have won their 250th game.    BUY OUR MASTERPIECES Keep in mind that if you’re obsessed with these funny little jerks, like us, you’ll want to check out the in-game store where additional teams can be drooled over and purchased.  But if you ruin your keyboard or mobile device due to an electrical short circuit, that’s your own fault!  _________________________________________  Keep up to date with Promotions, Fan Contests, and News from Ninth Dimension Studios by following us on Facebook and Twitter!  VISIT US: NinthDimensionStudios.com  FOLLOW US: twitter.com/Ninth_Dimension  FIND US: facebook.com/NinthDimensionStudios", "genre": ["Action"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-06-01", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-166503-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-166503-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Ninth Dimension Studios, LLC (Publisher)", "Ninth Dimension Studios, LLC (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}
